question: Which two nations were involved in the "Isla Calero Dispute of 2010"?
explanation: Costa Rica and Nicaragua were the two nations involved in the Isla Calero Dispute of 2010. Isla Calero or Calero Island is the largest island in Costa Rica which lies along the San Juan River which flows along the border between Costa Rica and Nicaragua. In 2015, the International Court of Justice decided that the territory in dispute belonged to Costa Rica.
